message.content:
1. A study was conducted on the efficacy of olanzapine/fluoxetine combination (OFC).
2. The study focused on the treatment of bipolar depression.
3. The subjects of the study were children and adolescents.
4. The study aimed to improve health-related quality of life (QoL).

messages.content:
Statement: We examined the efficacy of olanzapine/fluoxetine combination (OFC) in improving health-related quality of life (QoL) in the treatment of bipolar depression in children and adolescents.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
